overview: With the arrival of a fumigator at a rural nursing home, the young nurse Flavia will live strange nightmares that intertwine the attraction the man arouses in her and the warnings made by Norma, a veteran nurse who in turn is obsessed with caring for an old man who suffers from Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis.
tagline: Someone is watching us, no one can hear us
title: El Monte Próximo
